modName: MMs Realistic Lighting INI File for Vanilla Graphics Setting
summary: INI file for the Realistic Lighting Mod Version 3_31 Vanilla
descriptionHtml:
This is an INI file for the Realistic Lighting Mod, Vanilla Version.

The nights are nice and dark, but not pitch black, the days are bright and colorful, the interiors look really nice now and not too dark or too bright, the dungeons are nice and creepy now, but not pitch black.

02/26/12 FINAL: FINAL VERSION: I am happy with my results. See screenshots. ;-)

02/24/12 ADDED: TORCH: I changed some values with the default vanilla torch, I doubled the radius, I doubled it\'s life span before it burns out, and I reduced the weight of it slightly so you can carry more. I did play around with some different colors, but ended up back at the default color which seems best. The torch mod I listed below was designed for RL default settings and not for vanilla settings, so it was a little hard on the eyes, that was why I did my own. ;-)


REQUIREMENTS

Realistic Lighting Version 3_31 Vanilla Version

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654


SUGGESTED MODS (not required but you really should use them)

More Dynamic Shadows

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8262

Revamped Exterior Fog

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9930

Remove Ambient Interior Fog

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9571

Torches for Realistic Lighting

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8741

Warmer Magic Lights

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4419

Real Effect Candle

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7643

Shadow Striping Fix

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8043



BIG THANKS!!

To plutoman for his great Realistic Lighting Mod and also Sydney and Redguard and all the other dudes over at the Realistic Lighting Mod comments section, whose help and info about using this great mod has been so helpful. ;-)
author: Marlboro Man
